overview: Features a concert of "FUTURE POP," the national tour held by Perfume at Yokohama Arena on December 12, 2018. Includes about 2-hour performances. Limited edition additionally includes six songs shot in different angles (panoramic footage, ones focusing on each member) plus complete version of "TOKYO GIRL" lectured by members during concerts and more. Comes with a deluxe booklet and sticker(s).
title: Perfume 7th Tour 2018  "Future Pop"
